aboutSec.title: About Us
aboutSec.subtitle: Learn more about us
aboutSec.description: Altoukhy Glass launched in 1998 as a specialist company in glass works, supplying and installing all types of glass works. Altoukhy Glass takes a keen commitment to serving their clients and providing them with the highest quality of glass works with prompt installation and suitable prices.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyUs.description: At Al-Tawkhi Glass, we combine extensive experience since our founding in 1998 with an unwavering commitment to providing the highest quality standards in glass work. We specialize in supplying and installing all types of glass efficiently and quickly, while ensuring competitive prices to suit your needs. Choosing us means relying on a reliable partner who prioritizes customer satisfaction, delivering innovative and durable glass solutions that meet your expectations.

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: We ensure the highest quality in all our glass products, meeting international standards and exceeding customer expectations.

executionSpeed.title: Execution Speed
executionSpeed.desc: Fast and efficient project execution, ensuring every task is delivered on time with no compromise on the quality of results provided.

latestDesigns.title: Latest Designs
latestDesigns.desc: Our glass solutions feature cutting-edge design inspired by modern trends, bringing innovation and style to every project we complete.

safety.title: Safety
safety.desc: Prioritizing safety in every step, our products are rigorously tested to meet strict standards while ensuring safety for all involved.

supply.title: Supply
supply.desc: Reliable supply chain management ensures timely delivery of all materials, partnering with trusted providers to meet client needs.

installation.title: Installation
installation.desc: Our professional team offers precise installation services, ensuring durability and a seamless finish for all glass-based projects.

About.title: ABOUT OUR COMPANY
About.desc: Altoukhy Glass launched in 1998 as a specialist company in glass works, supply and install all types of Glass works Altoukhy Glass takes a keen commitment for servicing their clients and providing them with the highest quality of glass works with prompt installation and suitable prices

Mission.title: Our Mission
Mission.desc: We have always searched to employ the best-qualified engineers and technicians and to retain skilled and trained workers. Over the years, our experience and projects have expanded and grown to include all areas of Egypt. This continuous growth reflects our commitment to excellence and delivering top-quality results in every endeavor.

Vision.title: Our Vision
Vision.desc: Is conontinu ally grow and improve in order to consistently exced our customer's expectation in quality and value , not only in size and scope , the performance of Altoukhy Glass' developing a quality service show- case is a reflection of its brand and identity to be Egypt's most reliable glass processing and supplying company in Egypt .
